body: Dear all,  Would you advise on how to get the right information out of ConditionalStatement? In the SunPath component, I set the conditional statement to 'a>15' to show all sun positions where drybulb temperature is higher than 15 C, however, the sun path shows some values lower than 15 C (see below). I would appreciate if you tell me how to fix it to show only > 15C. Find attached .gh file. Thanks in advance for your help[](http://api.ning.com:80/files/sWrFHZQXnlWpebFbalLDm0PrmgC0t3gZnfPCsXxP9JrORxjbOlUO5W7MtQaQim53GE2Q1yyPnvLgSXDr5qkPfgZbQIQUviAk/CondicionalStatement.jpg)

replies.body:
Hi Jose,

This looks like a bug. We had one hour of discrepancy between data and sun position which is fixed recently. This might be happening because of that. I'm traveling right now but will take a closer look next week.

Mostapha

Jose,

Thanks for finding and reporting this bug.  I just fixed it:

[https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/commit/690a2ec038ac9610...](https://github.com/mostaphaRoudsari/ladybug/commit/690a2ec038ac9610ff2009a32000c31f1d6d215e)

As Mostapha said, it resulted from a recent change we made to ensure that the solar position is aligned with the hours from the EPW.

Thanks again,

-Chris

Mostapha, Chris et al, 

Thanks so much for fixing the bug, it's working perfectly. Furthermore, thanks for developing and promoting such a useful environmental plugins.
